hero.title: The infrastructure for participation that creates value.
hero.subtitle: HelpLab connects citizens, businesses, and institutions to turn civic engagement into measurable data and real resources for local communities. We give structure to occasional participation.

businessBenefits.title: One ecosystem, three actors, one shared impact

items.title: For Citizens
items.text: Turn your everyday commitment into certified actions. Take part in real challenges in your neighborhood and help increase the value of your city.

items.title: For Businesses
items.text: Fund change and obtain reliable data for your sustainability reporting (ESG). Make your territorial impact visible and measurable.

items.title: For Public Administrations
items.text: Activate new private resources and channel civic energy into a dynamic map of local needs. Govern your territory using objective data.

testimonials.title: An ecosystem where value generates value.

items.title: Why it works
items.quote: HelpLab is not based on goodwill alone, but on a carefully designed balance of interests. When citizens act, businesses invest, and territories improve.

items.title: No wasted effort
items.quote: Every challenge is designed to be sustainable over time, ensuring that citizens’ energy always finds technical and financial support.

items.title: Verifiable impact
items.quote: HelpLab turns small actions into verifiable data, useful for territorial planning and ESG reporting.

hero.title: Your time is valuable. Give it shape!
hero.subtitle: You don’t need to be a full-time activist to improve your neighborhood. With HelpLab, every small action becomes part of a collective challenge supported by businesses and recognized by institutions.

finalCta.title: From occasional participation to certified impact
finalCta.subtitle: Ready to turn sustainability from a cost into an investment? HelpLab is the tool that gives structure, data, and resources to civic engagement in your territory.

contact.label: Get started
contact.subject: Request for information about HelpLab solutions for businesses
contact.body: Please describe your organization, your sector, and leave a contact to receive a quick response.

howItWorks.title: From investment to data: how HelpLab enables your ESG strategy.

steps.title: Identify impact
steps.text: Choose an existing local challenge or co-design a tailored intervention aligned with your sustainability goals.

steps.title: Activate participation
steps.text: Provide the necessary resources. HelpLab connects your investment directly to citizens’ energy.

steps.title: Monitor with hybrid audit
steps.text: Track progress in real time. Receive certified data, SROI calculations, and outputs ready for CSRD and ESG reporting.
